# Publications

```{r, echo=FALSE, warnings=FALSE}
`%ni%` = Negate(`%in%`)
profile <- scholar::get_profile("5-qU7lkAAAAJ&h")
pub_num <- scholar::get_publications("5-qU7lkAAAAJ&h") %>%
    distinct(title, .keep_all = TRUE) %>% filter(journal %ni% c("University of East Anglia", "OUP (Oxford)")) %>% nrow()

```

**Google Scholar metrics: h-index: `r profile$h_index`**, **Number of Publications: `r pub_num`**
